alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Meeker; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:59AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meeker, southern Kandiyohi and northeastern Renville Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 359 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atwater, or 7 miles east of Willmar, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Atwater around 410 AM CDT. Grove City around 415 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cosmos. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 65 and 111. U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 80 and 88. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 107 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
